mapper.select: select * from word where setNo = #{setNo} order by orderno
mapper.update: merge into word using dual on (wordno = #{wordNo}) when matched then update set word = #{word} , meaning = #{meaning} when not matched then insert (wordNo, setNo, word, meaning, wordImg, orderno) values(wordNo.nextval, #{setNo}, #{word}, #{meaning}, '', #{orderNo})
